name: Rhythm Town
description:
A rhythm game made for Mini Jam #125! The theme was "Signal"

"A world where robots have taken control over humans... A world ruled by rhythm, where the only hope left is the power of music".

In this game you find yourself on a street fight against a robot. Follow the rhythm until the end while defending from the robot's attacks to the beat in order to win the battle!

And remember... always follow the beat

(For the best experience, do NOT play in full screen)

Controls:
F -> Red circle (up)
D -> Blue circle (down)
Space -> White circle (wave area)

(Background and Idea)
When I first saw the jam banner with the wave going through the circle, I immediately thought of making a rhythm game set in a futuristic world where you get a "wave signal" when you have to press a button, but unfortunately due to time constraints I didn't manage to follow the theme properly. Still wanted to publish it though since it came out pretty well imo.
